entity.name: User
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT USER_ID, COMPANY_ID, LOGIN_NAME, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL_ID, STATUS, IS_OWNER FROM USERS WHERE COMPANY_ID = '${dataimporter.delta.companyId}';
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT USER_ID FROM USERS WHERE MODIFIED_ON > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD('${dataimporter.last_index_time}',INTERVAL -1 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i');
